title: TraceAegis: Securing LLM-Based Agents via Hierarchical and Behavioral Anomaly Detection
summary: LLM-based agents have demonstrated promising adaptability in real-world applications. However, these agents remain vulnerable to a wide range of attacks, such as tool poisoning and malicious instructions, that compromise their execution flow and can lead to serious consequences like data breaches and financial loss.
